txt.en: Once a clandestine group working to identify would-be enemies of the Heirs of Castamir, the Ledger-keepers reformed under the Kindred of the Coin with a new purpose. The Ledger-keepers of Umbar BarharbÃªl now log actions and deeds, undertaken by citizens and guests of the country alike, into ledgers meant to weigh the measure and heft of the people's contributions. It may seem an intrusive and unnecessary effort, but in a nation once ruled by vile tyranny and secrets, the transparency is a welcome change to the populace.
